page.title: 01OUR BLOCK IN OLDHAM
page.content: The block we have been allocated covers part of the centre of Oldham and all of the suburbs between Oldham and Ashton. The road between these two towns is one edge of our square and is the focal point of of the activity in the square. Most of the housing is pre-war, but there is a large housing estate built in the 1960's.As part of Greater Manchester all the local services are jointly run by Greater Manchester Council(to be abolished in 1986) and Oldham Borough Council. Leisure in the area is fairly limited.Several community centres hold regular functions,but with a cinema in Ashton,and one theatre in each town,it is neccesary to move out of the block for ntertainment. There is however a large park in the area called Alexandra Park.
